CustomField.formula: IF( OneCRM__Income__r.RecordType.Name = "Payment", IF( AND( TEXT(OneCRM__Income__r.OneCRM__Status__c) = "Success", TEXT(OneCRM__Income__r.OneCRM__Payment_Type__c) = "Credit Card", ISBLANK(OneCRM__Income__r.OneCRM__TransactionId__c), ISBLANK(OneCRM__Income__r.OneCRM__Status_Code__c), ISBLANK(OneCRM__Income__r.OneCRM__StatusReason__c), OR( ISBLANK(OneCRM__Income__r.OneCRM__StatusText__c), OneCRM__Income__r.OneCRM__StatusText__c != "Recorded without Processing" ), ISBLANK(OneCRM__Income__r.OneCRM__StatusID__c) ), "recordedWithoutProcessingInCRM", TEXT(OneCRM__Income__r.OneCRM__Status__c) ), IF( OneCRM__Amount_Outstanding__c = 0, "pledgeIsPaidOff", "pledgeIsNotPaidOff" ) )
CustomField.label: Icon
